thread.title: Promo video for Samsung Galaxy C5 Pro leaked, launch expected on February 28th
thread.title_full: Promo video for Samsung Galaxy C5 Pro leaked, launch expected on February 28th

title: Promo video for Samsung Galaxy C5 Pro leaked, launch expected on February 28th
text:
Promo video for Samsung Galaxy C5 Pro leaked, launch expected on February... Promo video for Samsung Galaxy C5 Pro leaked, launch expected on February 28th By - February 13, 2017 “The Galaxy C5 Pro will sport an all-metal design, a fingerprint sensor and a 16MP selfie camera” 
Earlier this year, the upcoming Samsung Galaxy C5 Pro was leaked in renders and a promotional poster. Now ahead of the unveiling, a new promotional video of the phone has also hit the interwebs. The video was spotted on the Retail Samsung website on its Retail Mode demo application. 
As seen in the promo video, the Samsung Galaxy C5 Pro will sport an all-metal unibody design with a three-line split antenna design. The phone will flaunt a 16-megapixel selfie camera. It will get a physical home button, which will hide a fingerprint sensor beneath. 
Earlier, reports have suggested that the Samsung Galaxy C5 Pro will get a 5.2-inch full HD display, a Snapdragon 625 SoC, 6GB of RAM, 64GB of storage, a 16MP rear snapper, Android Marshmallow and a beefy battery. The promo video indicates that the phone will be unveiled on February 28th.
